Went to the front desk to speak to manager to get it resolved and when I advised that his initial monetary offer off the bill was insufficient he came back and offered one night off plus the same amount and to grab lunch and a drink which at the time I found acceptable
I returned to the check in desk where a different individual was able to address the situation
We have never experienced such low quality room service in a hotel of this type
Upon checkin I was immediately upgraded without asking to a lovely room
